summary: Boromir armor made by a retextured mashup of witcher assets
descriptionHtml:
Boromir's Armor

_________________________________

Details:

Fully craftable.
Found under leather section.
Costs 4x leather, 4x leather strips, 2x iron ingot
Temperable

No enchantment
_________________________________

Credits:
Luddemann
Fenriks for rigging
CD project red for meshes
_________________________________

Version history:
1.0 Initial release
_________________________________

Permissions:
Ask before use. Dont upload anywhere else. It may be translated into other languages.
author: Luddemann
